values: 速度；迅速；快速；高速；敏捷；速率；曝光率；感光度；苯丙胺（一种兴奋剂）；安非他明（一种兴奋剂）
加速；快速移动；快速前行；促进；快速运送

synonym.mean: 超速，加速；加速，迅速前行；兴隆
速度，速率；迅速，快速；昌盛，繁荣
加快…的速度；使成功，使繁荣

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 快速行动的人或物；调节速度装置

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，指步行的速度，常引申指活动的进度或生产率。
作“速度”讲时，与speed同义，可换用。作速率解时，指相对增长的速度，也指两种相比较而得出的标准速度。
普通用词，指单位时间内行进的固定速度或速率，也指可能达到的最高速度。
技术用词，指物体沿着一定方向运动时的速率。
中性词，用作褒义指动作迅速，事情做得又快又好；作贬义用时，指做事急躁，行为鲁莽，得不到预期的结果。
指急速从事某项活动或匆忙对付一件事情，含明显慌乱的意味。
多用于褒义，指行动敏捷快速，效果好。
指迅速、敏捷地结事某事，强调敏捷和及时。
着重指频率或速率运转加快。
指由于事的紧迫性或突然性而加速。
含义与hurry相近，但显得更仓促更慌乱。
指赶紧或匆忙地做某事或催促别人做某事，隐含草率或混乱意味。
普通用词，指增加速度、速率。

word_group.brief_definition: 爱高速行驶的驾车者；快速投球手
全速运行；以预期的速度进行；无所不晓的；掌握最新信息的；跟上时代的

bilingual.target: 她应该提高她的阅读速度。

bilingual.source: I don't know how to increase my reading speed.
bilingual.target: 我不知道如何提高我的阅读速度。

bilingual.source: It has a digital display that records your steps, speed and distance.
bilingual.target: 它有一个数字显示屏，可以记录你的步数、速度和距离。

bilingual.source: Flying at more than twice the speed of sound, Concorde took people from London or Paris to New York in just over three hours.
bilingual.target: 以超过音速两倍的速度飞行，协和飞机从伦敦或巴黎到纽约只需三个多小时。

bilingual.source: The inverse of increasing speed is decreasing speed.
bilingual.target: 增加速度的相反的是减少速度。

bilingual.source: The speed of a photon is the speed of light.

bilingual.target: 马赫数是速度的一个单位。

bilingual.source: He drives at a very slow speed.

list.abstract: speed（英 [spiːd]，美 [spiːd]），英语单词，作名词为速度；苯异丙胺；安非他明。作动词为快速移动；使兴旺发达；帮助成功。短语搭配有speed up（使加速）。例句为“They like to go at high speed.（他们喜欢高速行驶。）” speed相关近义词有quicken up、to accelerate等，相关反义词有linger、decelerate。
speed是日本流行音乐少女组合，由岛袋宽子、今井绘理子、上原多香子和新垣仁绘四位成员组成。 Speed于1996年以平均年龄12.5岁出道，首个作品《Body&Soul》便引起业界关注，之后成绩傲人，以锐不可当的气势征服了日本乐坛，并凭借演唱日剧《一吻定情》的主题曲红遍亚洲。

yingyinNormal.en: Doesn't have the speed anymore, but his technique is flawless.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他的速度变慢，但他的技巧无懈可击。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course, at the speed of trains and planes, the effect is minuscule.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，以火车与飞机的速度，对时间膨胀的影响是很微小的。

yingyinNormal.en: Cancer is basically an inability of the body to control the speed at which cells divide.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从根本上来说，癌症是身体缺乏调节细胞分裂速度能力的体现。

yingyinNormal.en: Jack still sees the beam dropping down and Jill still sees the light beam travel a longer distance, except this time Jack and Jill cannot disagree on the speed because the speed of light remains the same no matter what.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰克依然会看到光束反弹吉尔还是会看到该光束移动得更远，例外的是，这次杰克和吉尔却会对光的速度有分歧。这是因为光的速度无论如何还是保留不变。

yingyinNormal.en: Form a car speeding down the road. Speed up the image infinitely, then the car disappears.
yingyinNormal.zh: 假设一辆车在马路上奔驰，再把速度无限提高，车子就会消失。

yingyinNormal.en: Cancer is like a car crash. Your body typically regulates the speed at which your cells divide.
yingyinNormal.zh: 癌症就像一场车祸。通常，你的身体调节着细胞分裂的速度。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh yeah, check this out. For every dollar Shutter Speed makes, one penny of it goes right in Joey's pocket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，“极限速度”，每赚一块钱，乔伊就能分到百分之一。

yingyinNormal.en: And because speed is distance divided by time, Jill actually sees the ball move faster.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为速度等于距离除以时间，事实上 吉尔所看到球比杰克所看到的移动得更快。

yingyinNormal.en: The Deadly Nadder! Speed 8, armor 16. The Hideous Zippleback. Plus 11, stealth, times 2.
yingyinNormal.zh: 致命纳得! 速度8级、防御力16级。丑陋双头龙, 隐匿性11级，攻击性加倍。

yingyinNormal.en: And if the speed is the same while the distance is different, this means the time taken will be different as well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果速度是一样的话，而距离却不一样，那花的时间将也不一样。

yingyinNormal.en: But they found something very curious. The speed of light remained the same no matter what the Earth was doing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是结果并非如此，有趣的是不管地球往哪个方向移动光的速度并没有改变。

yingyinNormal.en: Sometimes the two-dimensional effect does not turn out to be facing to the audience, because the shell is spinning in very very high speed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有时二维效果最后并没有面对观众，因为烟花弹旋转速度很快。

yingyinNormal.en: It's called Shutter Speed, it's really cool. Yeah, I meet this girl in the subway and we fall in love in like a day, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 片名是“极限速度”，超酷的，我在地铁遇见一个女孩，一天之内坠入情网。

yingyinNormal.en: Because you'd get pulled in without picking up enough speed to escape and you WOULD spiral in to your doom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为地球将会由于无法获得足够的速度以逃离太阳引力，而最终以螺旋方式撞上太阳而至末日。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll put in a request for her personal information, try to find out what might have caused it, but NYPD Research isn't known for their speed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我去申请拿到她的个人信息，查找一下诱因，但纽约警局搜索组可向来速度不快。

yingyinNormal.en: Grandpa Pig speaking. We're almost at your house. But the traffic is still moving at the speed of a snail. A very, very slow snail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是猪爷爷。我们就快到你家了。但是车流还是在以蜗牛的速度在移动。一只很慢很慢的蜗牛。

yingyinNormal.en: Checkmate. Again? Obviously, you're not well suited for three-dimensional chess. Perhaps three-dimensional candy land would be more your speed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 将军。又将？显然你还不够格来玩三维国际象棋，你的速度或许更适合玩三维糖果盒游戏。

yingyinNormal.en: On the front and rear bumper, there are three radar units. They detect the speed of oncoming cars. And slow down if there are any obstacles.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在前后保险杠上，有三个雷达探测器，用来探测行驶过来的车辆的速度，一旦遇到障碍就会减速。

yingyinNormal.en: In fact, their speed causes the atomic clocks on board to disagree with clocks on the ground by seven millionths of a second daily.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，GPS卫星的行驶速度导致飞行着的原子钟与地上的原子钟之间产生每天7百万分之一秒之差。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not there because I'm taking things slow, which, by the way, compared to you guys, approaches warp speed. And take down that camera.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不在她家，因为我也决定慢慢来，这个...跟你们比起来，都快接近星际速度了，快把摄像头给我撤了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 速度; 进度; 快速

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 速度；苯异丙胺；安非他明；成功；繁荣；快；迅速；快门速度；感光度；挡

sense_info_list.zh: 速度; 进度; 快速

examination_example.sentence: Wales has introduced special low <highlight>speed</highlight> limits to minimise pollution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 威尔士引入了特定的低速限制，以最大限度地减少污染。

examination_example.sentence: We still have the imaginative capacity to rise above temptation and reverse the high-<highlight>speed</highlight> trend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们仍然有富于想象的能力，让我们不受诱惑的影响，并完全改变高速的发展趋势。

examination_example.sentence: We unconsciously associate fast food with <highlight>speed</highlight> and impatience and carry those impulses into whatever else we're doing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们一想到快餐，就无意识地联想起快速和急躁，并把这些一时产生的情绪带到我们正在做的任何事情当中。

sense_info_list.en:
quickness in movement or action; 
make something move or happen quickly

examination_example.sentence: The pace of change in energy sources appears to be <highlight>speeding</highlight> up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 能源变化的步伐似乎正在加快。

sense_info_list.en: a gear on a bicycle, in a car, or others
the rate at which a photographic film absorbs or reacts to light
a drug that makes the mind or body more active
travel at a speed that is greater than the legal limit
the time taken by a camera shutter to open and close

word_usage.usage:
speed，pace，rate都可以表示“速度”，区别在于：
speed常用于指交通工具等运动的速率或事情发生的速度。
pace 多指人步行的速度，常引申为生活、变化等的速度。
rate 常指某事在一段时间内发生的速度，可与 speed 换用。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 速度; 速率; 加速

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 迅速完成的；快速移动的

word_family.mean: n. 速度；苯异丙胺；安非他明；成功；繁荣；快；迅速；快门速度；感光度；挡

sense_info_list.zh: 速度; 速率; 加速

examination_example.sentence: Impose heavier penalties on <highlight>speeding</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对超速驾驶处以更重的处罚。

examination_example.sentence: It is expanding at an accelerating <highlight>speed</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它正在加速扩张。

examination_example.sentence: They portray drivers who enjoy <highlight>speed</highlight> on the road.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们描绘了享受高速行驶的司机。

word_usage.usage:
speed表“速度”，用作可数名词时，其前常加不定冠词a。
示例：汽车最高时速是147英里。
误 The car has the top speed of 147 mph.
正 The car has a top speed of 147 mph.

“以...速度前进”用at...speed表达，?“有...速度”用with...speed。
示例：两个赛跑者以同样速度前进。
误 The two runners are running with the same speed.
正 The two runners are running at the same speed.

“低速”和“高速”用at a low/high speed表达，“以高/低/全速”的表达为：at high/ low/ full/ top speed，注意此时形容词前不用冠词。
示例：汽车以全速拐弯。
误 The car turned the corner at a full speed.
正 The car turned the corner at full speed.

speed可表“快, 迅速”，为不可数名词，其后常接of短语作定语，有时也可用在名词前作定语。
示例：I was amazed at his speed of working.
他办事之麻利让我深感叹服。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 速度; 速率; 加速
快速行动; 加速进行

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 迅速完成的；快速移动的

word_family.mean: n. 速度；苯异丙胺；安非他明；成功；繁荣；快；迅速；快门速度；感光度；挡

sense_info_list.zh: 速度; 速率; 加速

examination_example.sentence: It is as effective as <highlight>speed</highlight> bumps.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它和减速带一样管用。

examination_example.sentence: They keep within <highlight>speed</highlight> limits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们保持在限速范围内。

examination_example.sentence: They like to go at high <highlight>speed</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们喜欢高速行驶。

sense_info_list.en:
quickness in movement or action; 
make something move or happen quickly
sense_info_list.zh: 快速行动; 加速进行

sense_info_list.en: travel at a speed that is greater than the legal limit

examination_example.sentence: He got a ticket for <highlight>speeding</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他因为超速被开罚单。

examination_example.sentence: On the other hand, imagine the cost savings for local police enforcement and town budgets without all those <highlight>speeding</highlight> and parking tickets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，想象一下，如果没有了那些超速和违章停车的罚单，当地警察的执法和城镇预算会节省多少成本。

examination_example.sentence: Or like <highlight>speeding</highlight>, it's very easy to put speed cameras in certain places.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 或者像超速一样，在某些地方安装超速摄像头是很容易的。

word_usage.usage:
“低速”和“高速”用at a low/high speed表达，“以高/低/全速”的表达为：at high/ low/ full/ top speed，注意此时形容词前不用冠词。
示例：汽车以全速拐弯。
误 The car turned the corner at a full speed.
正 The car turned the corner at full speed.

“以...速度前进”用at...speed表达，?“有...速度”用with...speed。
示例：两个赛跑者以同样速度前进。
误 The two runners are running with the same speed.
正 The two runners are running at the same speed.

speed表“速度”，用作可数名词时，其前常加不定冠词a。
示例：汽车最高时速是147英里。
误 The car has the top speed of 147 mph.
正 The car has a top speed of 147 mph.

speed可表“快, 迅速”，为不可数名词，其后常接of短语作定语，有时也可用在名词前作定语。
示例：I was amazed at his speed of working.
他办事之麻利让我深感叹服。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 速度; 速率; 加速

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 速度; 速率; 加速

examination_example.sentence: If the only reading you ever do is the novel or magazine, the <highlight>speed</highlight> at which you read-probably does not matter very much.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你唯一的阅读量就是看小说和杂志，那么阅读速度就不那么重要了。

examination_example.sentence: Here are some tips to help improve your reading <highlight>speed</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这里有一些帮助你提高阅读速度的小技巧。

examination_example.sentence: We're looking at the benefits of systems which control their <highlight>speed</highlight> as a way of preventing that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们正在研究控制速度系统的优点，它可以防止这种情况的发生。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 速度; 进度; 快速

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 调节速度的装置；违章超速驾驶者

word_family.mean: n. 速度；苯异丙胺；安非他明；成功；繁荣；快；迅速；快门速度；感光度；挡

sense_info_list.zh: 速度; 进度; 快速

examination_example.sentence: Could you give me some advice to improve my reading <highlight>speed</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你能给我一些建议来提高我的阅读速度吗？

examination_example.sentence: They are directly connected with the wind <highlight>speed</highlight> and the time that wind lasts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们与风速和风力持续时间直接相关。

examination_example.sentence: The high-<highlight>speed</highlight> train between Qingdao and Beijing travels faster now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 青岛和北京之间的高铁现在速度更快了。

sense_info_list.en:
quickness in movement or action; 
make something move or happen quickly

examination_example.sentence: Hebei Province will <highlight>speed</highlight> up the building of an express line between Xiongan and Beijing Daxing International Airport.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 河北省将加快建设雄安至北京大兴国际机场的快速通道。

examination_example.sentence: The other riders <highlight>sped</highlight> past to the finish line.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他车手飞快地冲过终点线。

examination_example.sentence: We become insensitive to our experience, which means we process less information, and time seems to <highlight>speed</highlight> up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们对我们的经历变得不敏感，这意味着我们处理的信息更少，时间似乎变快了。

word_usage.usage:
speed表“速度”，用作可数名词时，其前常加不定冠词a。
示例：汽车最高时速是147英里。
误 The car has the top speed of 147 mph.
正 The car has a top speed of 147 mph.

“以...速度前进”用at...speed表达，?“有...速度”用with...speed。
示例：两个赛跑者以同样速度前进。
误 The two runners are running with the same speed.
正 The two runners are running at the same speed.

“低速”和“高速”用at a low/high speed表达，“以高/低/全速”的表达为：at high/ low/ full/ top speed，注意此时形容词前不用冠词。
示例：汽车以全速拐弯。
误 The car turned the corner at a full speed.
正 The car turned the corner at full speed.

speed可表“快, 迅速”，为不可数名词，其后常接of短语作定语，有时也可用在名词前作定语。
示例：I was amazed at his speed of working.
他办事之麻利让我深感叹服。
